text: Kenneth Charles "Ken" Osmond (June 7, 1943 - May 18, 2020) was an American actor and LAPD police officer. He played Eddie Haskell in Leave It to Beaver (1957-1963). He was born in Glendale, California. Osmond died at his home in Los Angeles on May 18, 2020 of problems caused by COPD and peripheral artery disease at the age of 76.Ken Osmond, ‘Leave It to Beaver’ Star Who Played Eddie Haskell, Dies at 76 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Ken Osmond at TVGuide.com *Ken Osmond at TVLand.com Category:Actors from Glendale, California Category:American movie actors Category:American child actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from COPD Category:Deaths from peripheral artery disease Category:American police officers Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Ken Osmond
